post.text: Join me in Akron, Ohio - for a few minutes! TOGETHER- WE WILL MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Joao
comment.text: We love you here in Florida. Having fundraiser for you Thursday at our golf club!!!

replies.author: Sarah
replies.text: Trump will be in Tampa rally on Wednesday

replies.author: Chandler
replies.text: Joao Y'all crack me up!! Don't you realize that you could be agreeing with a Russian troll that supports Trump on this site?

replies.author: Katelyn
replies.text: Willie you keep saying that. Why? You a troll?
